item.title: CatzEyes!

item.description:
Happy birthday Catz.

It’s a shame you had to leave, but I can’t blame you, trolls on BMS need plenty of patience. I always thought u were a better contributor to threads than most, even if you did have the occasional off-topic post

Hope to see u back when the mod gets released, maybe sooner

P.S. i hope you all get run over by a truck full of pandas for trolling in a beloved mod’s happy birthday thread

item.title: CatzEyes!
item.dc:creator: Paddy
item.description:
SassyRobot:

Everyone insisting Broteh should be banned should calm the fuck down.

This forum is absolute complete and utter cereal business at the moment.
P-Thunder was rude to me in my birthday thread. I didn’t ask anyone to fucking ban him because it’s a joke. No one gives a fucking shit and frankly, if this did genuinely hurt Catz’s feelings, you should be worried about her and not him.

Generally speaking, we’re all fucking adults here. I keep seeing posts aimed at me at the moment which are just ultra negative. It’s a fucking forum, I’m not going to slash my wrists or ragequit over it and neither is she. She isn’t some pathetic child that needs protecting, credit where it’s due, she always gave as good as she got and fair play. All of you white knighting in here!? Seriously!?
Do you honestly think that’s what she wants? It’s incredibly patronising.

You might think he isn’t contributing (SERIOUSLY?!) but he’s one of the few people on the forum that is consistently funny at the moment.

It wasn’t a joke. I actually hate you.

Read full topic

item.title: CatzEyes!
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
DansonDelta40:

That’s because he is an asshole. I would advocate a permaban. He is doing nothing but trolling anyway. And I don’t remember if there ever before was one so blunt and coldhearted to hijack a happy birthday thread for openly criticizing the person whose birthday it was.

What a huge piece of shit that guy is… yuck!

I’m really not surprised that he likes macs anymore. He’s a stereotypical pretentiousness mac asshole.

Anyway, this forum has rules and needlessly flaming a mod in her birthday thread most definitely breaks them. The rules haven’t been enforced of late because rawbean is gone and many of the other moderators would rather sit back and watch trolling/un-called for flaming than banning it. ):<

Read full topic
